4310610.name: The Skin Stapler
4310610.description:
Enter Carrion City

From the creator of Suffer the Night, Terror at Oakheart, Massacre at the Mirage, and Flesh Made Fear, Tainted Pact Games invites you into a grimy, neon-lit nightmare with The Skin Stapler.

Step into a decaying 1980s city where crime festers, morals rot, and a serial killer stalks in the shadows and alleyways. Blending grindhouse slasher horror with dark humor and investigative storytelling, The Skin Stapler delivers a tense, atmospheric experience where every scene drips with dread.

Will you uncover the truth buried beneath Carrion City…
Or become just another skin stapled to the walls?




About This Game

The Skin Stapler is a narrative-driven horror experience set in a decaying 1980s city drowning in crime, drugs, and moral collapse. Inspired by VHS slashers, grindhouse cinema, and noir crime dramas, the game blends unsettling horror with dark, B-movie humor to deliver a short but unforgettable descent into madness.


You play primarily as Detective Dick Slater, a burned-out veteran cop tasked with tracking a serial killer stalking the city’s streets. Known only as The Skin Stapler. You'll also get to play as a full cast of characters as they are stalked by The Skin Stapler.


The Skin Stapler primarily targets young women in their homes and workplaces, skins them, and staples their flesh to nearby walls, leaving behind grotesque displays and distorted audio tapes that taunt the police and hint at something deeper beneath the city.



A Short, Focused Horror Experience

The Skin Stapler is designed to be completed in one sitting and prioritizes atmosphere, story, and tension over combat or traditional survival mechanics.

Multiple Playable Perspectives

Experience Carrion City from different viewpoints, including a hardened veteran detective and ordinary civilians in the final moments of their lives. Each perspective adds context, contrast, and emotional weight to the investigation.

Grindhouse Slasher Atmosphere

Inspired by 1980s VHS horror and exploitation films, the game features stylized violence, neon-lit decay, and an unapologetically grim aesthetic that blends horror with dark, B-movie humor.

Dark Humor Amid the Dread

Bleak situations are punctuated with dry wit and grim comedy, creating tonal contrast that keeps the horror sharp and unpredictable.

Designed for Horror Fans

Built for players who appreciate slow-burn tension, unsettling imagery, and story-first horror experiences that linger long after the credits roll.



Wishlist: The Skin Stapler now, and prepare for the demo that is releasing very soon!
